amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce 2005 discretionary spending approximately 3 percent, exempting national defense, homeland security and veterans spending.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 108-735 to offset the cost of the supplemental with a proportional reduction of fiscal year 2005 discretionary funding once enacted. Funding for defense, homeland security and veterans would be specifically exempt.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hensarling amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 89 - 321 (Roll no. 500).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Hensarling.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Hensarling amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 89 - 321 (Roll no. 500).
